parameters.name: BizId
parameters.description:
A unique ID that identifies a single authentication task, not exceeding 64 characters. For a single authentication task, the system supports unlimited submissions until the final authentication is passed and the task is completed.

> Different BizIds are required for different authentication tasks.

parameters.name: BizType
parameters.description: Identifier for the business scenario using the real-person authentication service. Please refer to [Business Setup](~~127885~~) and complete the creation in the console first.

parameters.name: FaceImageUrl
parameters.description: HTTP or HTTPS link to the frontal face image.

parameters.name: IdCardBackImageUrl
parameters.description: HTTP or HTTPS link to the national emblem side of the ID card.

parameters.name: IdCardFrontImageUrl
parameters.description: HTTP or HTTPS link to the portrait side of the ID card image.

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: The ID of the end user, such as the account ID of the end user.
